text: Statue of Tokugawa Naritomo, kept at Chōe-ji in Nagoya was a Japanese daimyō of the Edo period, who ruled the Owari Domain. His childhood name was Yasuchiyo (愷千代). He had a retreat north of Nagoya Castle in Horibata-chō (堀端町). ==Family== * Father: Tokugawa Harukuni (1776–1793), brother of the 11th shōgun Tokugawa Ienari * Mother: Nijo Yasuko, daughter of Nijo Harutaka * Wife: Tokugawa Toshihime (1789–1817), daughter of the 11th shōgun Tokugawa Ienari Category:1793 births Category:1850 deaths Category:Lords of Owari
title: Tokugawa Naritomo
